reviews.review_msg: Expected to devote considerable time to the project, including in and out-of-class presentations. The project may give an opportunity for publication and provides experience in getting feedback. Lectures and in-class activities were good, but the workload is enormous. Must attend meetings. She gives good opportunities, but expects dedication.

Tom is a really caring and responsible professor. If you have a question, you should go to his office and he will be glad and he will help you to get a good grade. His class is not hard, you just need to go to class and take notes cuz he wont post them. Its quite easy to get a good grade if you keep in touch with him.
